product_name: The North Face Chugach 16 Winter Pack
long_description: The North Face Chugach 16 winter pack is sure to become a go-to favorite for snowy inbounds and backcountry adventures. Curved shoulder straps, sternum strap and waistbelt keep pack close; back panel sheds snow. Insulated hydration port protects hydration reservoir tube (reservoir sold separately). The North Face Chugach 16 winter features an innovative avalanche tool pocket to keep your backcountry necessities organized and accesible. Ski and snowboard carry system holds gear securely when hiking for turns. Durable ballistic nylon fabric stands up to wear and tear in the backcountry.
short_description: The North Face Chugach 16 winter pack is sure to become a go-to favorite for snowy inbounds and backcountry adventures.
